title: Enhanced electrochemical dissolution of iridium oxide in acidic electrolytes through presence of metal ions: shortened lifetime and hope for recovery
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, 2,2225-2238
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00257A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Raghunandan Sharma, Per Morgen, Darko Makovec, Saso Gyergyek, Shuang Ma Andersen
Cyclic deposition and stripping of metal ions (e.g. Cu2+) on Ir-oxides enhance electrochemical dissolution of Ir-oxides, likely due to weakening of the Ir–O–Ir bonds. The phenomenon is influential to IrOx catalyst stability and recovery perspective.
